answerText: Kinetic coefficients [10] Obtaining the kinetic coefficients usually involves solving the transport equation named for this man, who is the namesake of the statistical model governing ideal gases near equilibrium along with Maxwell.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Chicago A  | 12 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The Onsager reciprocal relations imply the symmetry of the matrices of these quantities, which are identical for thermal diffusion and the Dufour thermodiffusion effect. For 10 points each: [10] Name these quantities, which, for an electron gas, can be expressed in terms of galvanomagnetic and thermomagnetic tensor components. Generally they relate forces and fluxes.
